item.title: The Outsiders
item.description: wikipedia What a nice 1983’s surprise. Found this one after looking over half hour for something to watch. I was expecting simple plot, nothing that would make me think about it next day. But it did. It does look like a simple comming of age type of movie at first, but surely not a light one which was a good surprise. Getting to know Robert Frost’s poem Nothing Gold Can Stay was in itself, worth the movie:
